oai_dc:dc.dc:title: BioWad Newsletter PlantyOrganic November 2014
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bus, Michiel
Hospers-Brands, A.J.T.M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
Nutrient turnover
Farm nutrient management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Planty Organic is a study into a new and innovative agricultural system in general and the nitrogen cycle in particular. The study started in 2012 and is carried out at the Kollummerwaard model farm in Munnukezijl (on the boundary of Groningen/Friesland). More information about this interesting study can be found at the website www.biowad.nl.
In this Newsletter:
Looking back on the 2013-2014 season Status of the trial field Danes visit our trial field Wageningen University students write thesis Article in Akker
